For hiring managers and growing UX Pros

This is a collection of job descriptions over the years and across the industry. These are NOT open positions, but give you a feeling for how roles are described at different companies.

All the content from this site was collected by volunteers. Don't see job description from a company you watch? Submit it to the collection!
